title: Banner (Construction)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Banner is a wieldable item made on the banner easel, in a player-owned workshop. It may be made in any player's house and requires 48 Crafting, 1 regular plank, and 1 bolt of cloth. Prior to creating a banner, the player must have a crest assigned by Sir Renitee, the herald on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the White Knights' Castle. The first crest assignment is random and free, however, the player may choose their own crest by paying the herald 5,000 coins, although most of the crests have requirements to obtain.

content:
Not to be confused with Saradomin banner or Zamorak banner.
A player holding a banner with the Arrav crest.

A Banner is a wieldable item made on the banner easel, in a player-owned workshop. It may be made in any player's house and requires 48 Crafting, 1 regular plank, and 1 bolt of cloth. Prior to creating a banner, the player must have a crest assigned by Sir Renitee, the herald on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the White Knights' Castle. The first crest assignment is random and free, however, the player may choose their own crest by paying the herald 5,000 coins, although most of the crests have requirements to obtain.

Note: The Saradomin and Zamorak heraldic banners will not offer any protection in the God Wars Dungeon.

Crest Requirements
Arrav Shield of Arrav
Asgarnia None
Dorgeshuun The Lost Tribe
Dragon Dragon Slayer I
Fairy Lost City
Guthix 70+ Prayer
HAM None
Horse Toy horsey in inventory
Jogre None
Kandarin None
Misthalin None
Money Costs 500,000 coins
Saradomin 70+ Prayer
Skull Skulled
Varrock None
Zamorak 70+ Prayer
